body:
After my [most downvoted comment](https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/post/3sgn/after-terminating-our-servers-locking-our/d0ee), I [predicted their financial deplatforming](https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/post/4cu2/goodbye-patreon-hello-subscribestar). Feeling partially responsible, [I offered my apologies](https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/post/4fzo/vue-is-important-but-we-need/fc5o) which were met with an [instant ban](https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/post/4fzo/vue-is-important-but-we-need/fhew) 

![](https://i.ibb.co/52NvSGp/IMG-9248.jpg) 

They [refuse to explain why](https://ruqqus.com/+TheMemery/post/5r1h/so-sion123-was-threatened-with-a/jwo8?context=3). They're larping as a free speech site. Plebbit reborn.
body_html:
After my most downvoted comment, I predicted their financial deplatforming. Feeling partially responsible, I offered my apologies which were met with an instant ban

They refuse to explain why. They're larping as a free speech site. Plebbit reborn.

parent.body:
After my [most downvoted comment](https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/post/3sgn/after-terminating-our-servers-locking-our/d0ee), I [predicted their financial deplatforming](https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/post/4cu2/goodbye-patreon-hello-subscribestar). Feeling partially responsible, [I offered my apologies](https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/post/4fzo/vue-is-important-but-we-need/fc5o) which were met with an [instant ban](https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/post/4fzo/vue-is-important-but-we-need/fhew) 

![](https://i.ibb.co/52NvSGp/IMG-9248.jpg) 

They [refuse to explain why](https://ruqqus.com/+TheMemery/post/5r1h/so-sion123-was-threatened-with-a/jwo8?context=3). They're larping as a free speech site. Plebbit reborn.
